title: Russia says it has 'drastically' reduced military activity near Kyiv; Biden, Pentagon skeptical: Live Ukraine updates
content:
1. Russia says it has 'drastically' reduced military activity near Kyiv; Biden, Pentagon skeptical: Live Ukraine updates  USA TODAY
  2. Russia announces it will 'drastically reduce military activity' in two key Ukrainian cities  CNN
  3. Ukraine-Russia War Live News: Latest Updates  The New York Times
  4. Russia's Military Says It Will Reduce Military Operations In Kyiv, Chernihiv  NBC News
  5. Moscow says it will cut back on military activity in Kyiv, Chernihiv  Boston 25 News
contentSnippet:
Russia says it has 'drastically' reduced military activity near Kyiv; Biden, Pentagon skeptical: Live Ukraine updates  USA TODAY
Russia announces it will 'drastically reduce military activity' in two key Ukrainian cities  CNN
Ukraine-Russia War Live News: Latest Updates  The New York Times
Russia's Military Says It Will Reduce Military Operations In Kyiv, Chernihiv  NBC News
Moscow says it will cut back on military activity in Kyiv, Chernihiv  Boston 25 News

localize.title: ロシアはキエフ近郊の軍事行動を「大幅に」減らしたと発表。ウクライナの最新情報
俄罗斯称已 "大幅 "减少基辅附近的军事活动；拜登和五角大楼持怀疑态度。乌克兰的实时更新
俄羅斯稱已 "大幅 "減少基輔附近的軍事活動；拜登和五角大樓持懷疑態度。烏克蘭的實時更新
